languages.text: При вашем появлении на капитанском мостике Мастер вокса восхваляет Императора Человечества. Вигдис объясняет, что вы попали в аномалию, заставляющую людей на корабле непостижимым образом меняться друг с другом местами. На поиски Лорд-капитана тут же направили спасательный отряд, однако потребовалось немало времени, чтобы разыскать вас. В конце концов все закончилось благополучно — вы вновь за штурвалом и продолжаете странствие сквозь Простор Коронус. Да здравствует {name} фон Валанциус!

traits.locale_text: При вашем появлении на капитанском мостике Мастер Вокса восхваляет Императора Человечества. Вигдис объясняет, что вы попали в аномалию, заставляющую людей на корабле непостижимым образом меняться друг с другом местами. На поиски Лорд-капитана тут же направили спасательный отряд, однако потребовалось немало времени, чтобы разыскать вас. В конце концов все закончилось благополучно — вы вновь за штурвалом и продолжаете странствие сквозь Простор Коронус. Да здравствует {name} фон Валанциус!

languages.text: The Vox Master gives praise to the Emperor of Humanity as you make your entrance on the captain's bridge. Vigdis explains that you were trapped in an anomaly that made the people on the ship inexplicably trade places. A rescue squad was immediately dispatched to search for the Rogue Trader, but finding you took quite a bit of time. All's well that ends well: the Lord Captain is at the helm again, continuing {mf|his|her} journey through the Koronus Expanse. Long live {name} von Valancius!
languages.original_text: При вашем появлении на капитанском мостике Мастер вокса восхваляет Императора Человечества. Вигдис объясняет, что вы попали в аномалию, заставляющую людей на корабле непостижимым образом меняться друг с другом местами. На поиски Лорд-капитана тут же направили спасательный отряд, однако потребовалось немало времени, чтобы разыскать вас. В конце концов все закончилось благополучно — вы вновь за штурвалом и продолжаете странствие сквозь Простор Коронус. Да здравствует {name} фон Валанциус!

traits.locale_text: The Vox Master gives praise to the Emperor of Humanity as you make your entrance on the captain's bridge. Vigdis explains that you've been trapped in an anomaly that's been making the people on the ship inexplicably trade places. A rescue squad was immediately dispatched to search for the Lord Captain, but finding you has taken quite a bit of time. All's well that ends well: you're at the helm again, continuing your journey through the Koronus Expanse. Long live {name} von Valancius!

The Vox Master gives praise to the Emperor of Humanity as you make your entrance on the captain's bridge. Vigdis explains that you've been trapped in an anomaly that's been making the people on the ship inexplicably trade places. A rescue squad was immediately dispatched to search for the Lord Captain, but finding you has taken quite a bit of time. All's well that ends well: you're at the helm again, continuing your journey through the Koronus Expanse. Long live {name} von Valancius!

The Vox Master gives praise to the Emperor of Humanity as you make your entrance on the captain's bridge. Vigdis explains that you've been trapped in an anomaly that's been making the people on the ship inexplicably trade places. A rescue squad was immediately dispatched to search for the Lord Captain, but finding you has taken quite a bit of time. All's well that ends well: you're at the helm again, continuing your journey through the Koronus Expanse. Long live {name} von Valancius!

The Vox Master gives praise to the Emperor of Humanity as the Rogue Trader makes {mf|his|her} entrance on the captain's bridge. Vigdis explains that the Lord Captain was trapped in an anomaly that made the people on the ship inexplicably trade places. A rescue squad was immediately dispatched to search for the Rogue Trader, but finding {mf|His Lordship|Her Ladyship} took quite a bit of time. All's well that ends well: the Lord Captain is at the helm again, continuing {mf|his|her} journey through the Koronus Expanse. Long live {name} von Valancius!

The Vox Master gives praise to the Emperor of Humanity as the Rogue Trader makes {mf|his|her} entrance on the captain's bridge. Vigdis explains that the Lord Captain was trapped in an anomaly that made the people on the ship inexplicably trade places. A rescue squad was immediately dispatched to search for the Rogue Trader, but finding {mf|His Lordship|Her Ladyship} took quite a bit of time. All's well that ends well: the Lord Captain is at the helm again, continuing {mf|his|her} journey through the Koronus Expanse. Long live {name} von Valancius!

The Vox Master gives praise to the Emperor of Humanity as you make your entrance on the captain's bridge. Vigdis explains that you were trapped in an anomaly that made the people on the ship inexplicably trade places. A rescue squad was immediately dispatched to search for the Rogue Trader, but finding you took quite a bit of time. All's well that ends well: the Lord Captain is at the helm again, continuing {mf|his|her} journey through the Koronus Expanse. Long live {name} von Valancius!

languages.text: 当你再次出现在舰桥上时，音阵大师立刻赞美起了帝皇。维格迪斯解释说，刚刚飞船上发生了异常情况，船上的一部分人莫名其妙地交换了位置。发生异常情况之后，军官们立刻组织了一支救援队去寻找失踪的行商浪人，但他们花了很长时间才终于找到你。到最后，一切都很顺利，舰长大人重新回到了舰长室，继续进行{mf|他|她}在科罗努斯扩区的航行。{name}·冯·瓦兰修斯万岁！
languages.original_text: The Vox Master gives praise to the Emperor of Humanity as you make your entrance on the captain's bridge. Vigdis explains that you were trapped in an anomaly that made the people on the ship inexplicably trade places. A rescue squad was immediately dispatched to search for the Rogue Trader, but finding you took quite a bit of time. All's well that ends well: the Lord Captain is at the helm again, continuing {mf|his|her} journey through the Koronus Expanse. Long live {name} von Valancius!

traits.locale_text: 当你再次出现在舰桥上时，音阵大师立刻赞美起了帝皇。维格迪斯解释说，刚刚飞船上发生了异常情况，船上的一部分人莫名其妙地交换了位置。发生异常情况之后，军官们立刻组织了一支救援队去寻找失踪的行商浪人，但他们花了很长时间才终于找到你。到最后，一切都很顺利，舰长大人重新回到了舰长室，继续进行{mf|他|她}在科罗努斯扩区的航行。{name}·冯·瓦兰修斯万岁！

languages.text: La maestra de vocos da las gracias al Emperador de la Humanidad cuando vuelves al puente de mando. Vigdis explica que has sido atrapad{mf|o|a} por una anomalía que hacía que la gente cambiara sus posiciones en la nave. Se envió un escuadrón de rescate de inmediato, pero ha llevó tiempo encontrarte. Bien está lo que bien acaba: {mf|el|la} Lord Capitán vuelve a estar al mando y continúa su viaje por la Extensión de Koronus. ¡Larga vida a {name} von Valancius!
languages.original_text: The Vox Master gives praise to the Emperor of Humanity as you make your entrance on the captain's bridge. Vigdis explains that you were trapped in an anomaly that made the people on the ship inexplicably trade places. A rescue squad was immediately dispatched to search for the Rogue Trader, but finding you took quite a bit of time. All's well that ends well: the Lord Captain is at the helm again, continuing {mf|his|her} journey through the Koronus Expanse. Long live {name} von Valancius!

traits.locale_text: La maestra de vocos da las gracias al Emperador de la Humanidad cuando {mf|el|la} Comerciante Independiente vuelve al puente del capitán. Vigdis explica que {mf|el|la} Lord Capitán estaba atrapad{mf|o|a} en una anomalía que hacía que la gente cambiara sus posiciones en la nave. Se envió un escuadrón de rescate de inmediato, pero llevó tiempo encontrar a su señoría. Bien está lo que bien acaba: {mf|el|la} Lord Capitán vuelve a estar al mando y continúa su viaje por la Extensión de Koronus. ¡Larga vida a {name} von Valancius!

languages.text: あなたが艦橋に登場すると、ヴォクス・マスターは人類の皇帝に賛辞を送る。ヴィグディスの説明によると、あなたは船内の人々が不可解に入れ替わるような異変に巻き込まれたとのことだ。すぐに救助隊が派遣されローグトレーダーを探したが、閣下を見つけるにはかなりの時間を要したのだという。だが終わり良ければすべて良し。ロード・キャプテンは再び舵を取り、コロヌス・エクスパンスの旅を続ける。{mf|his|her}フォン・ヴァランシウス万歳！{name}
languages.original_text: The Vox Master gives praise to the Emperor of Humanity as you make your entrance on the captain's bridge. Vigdis explains that you were trapped in an anomaly that made the people on the ship inexplicably trade places. A rescue squad was immediately dispatched to search for the Rogue Trader, but finding you took quite a bit of time. All's well that ends well: the Lord Captain is at the helm again, continuing {mf|his|her} journey through the Koronus Expanse. Long live {name} von Valancius!

traits.locale_text: ローグトレーダーが艦橋に登場すると、マスター・ヴォクスは人類の皇帝に賛辞を送る。ヴィグディスの説明によると、ロード・キャプテンは船内の人々が不可解に入れ替わるような異変に巻き込まれたとのことだ。すぐに救助隊が派遣されローグトレーダーを探したが、閣下を見つけるにはかなりの時間を要したのだという。だが終わり良ければすべて良し。ロード・キャプテンは再び舵を取り、コロヌス・エクスパンスの旅を続ける。{name}フォン・ヴァランシウス万歳！

languages.text: Die Voxmeisterin lobt den Imperator der Menschheit, als du auf der Brücke des Captains erscheinst. Vigdis erklärt, dass du in einer Anomalie gefangen warst, durch die Personen auf dem Schiff aus unerklärlichen Gründen die Plätze getauscht haben. Es wurde unverzüglich ein Rettungstrupp entsandt, um {mf|den Freihändler|die Freihändlerin} zu finden, was allerdings eine Weile gedauert hat. Ende gut, alles gut: Der Lord Captain steht wieder am Ruder und setzt seine Reise durch die Koronus-Ausdehnung fort. Lang lebe {name} von Valancius!
languages.original_text: The Vox Master gives praise to the Emperor of Humanity as you make your entrance on the captain's bridge. Vigdis explains that you were trapped in an anomaly that made the people on the ship inexplicably trade places. A rescue squad was immediately dispatched to search for the Rogue Trader, but finding you took quite a bit of time. All's well that ends well: the Lord Captain is at the helm again, continuing {mf|his|her} journey through the Koronus Expanse. Long live {name} von Valancius!

traits.locale_text: Die Voxmeisterin lobt den Imperator der Menschheit, als du auf der Brücke des Captains erscheinst. Vigdis erklärt, dass du in einer Anomalie gefangen warst, durch die Personen auf dem Schiff aus unerklärlichen Gründen die Plätze getauscht haben. Es wurde unverzüglich ein Rettungstrupp entsandt, um {mf|den Freihändler|die Freihändlerin} zu finden, was allerdings eine Weile gedauert hat. Ende gut, alles gut: Der Lord Captain steht wieder am Ruder und setzt seine Reise durch die Koronus-Ausdehnung fort. Lang lebe {name} von Valancius!

Die Voxmeisterin lobt den Imperator der Menschheit, als {mf|der Freihändler|die Freihändlerin} auf der Brücke erscheint. Vigdis erklärt, dass der Lord Captain in einer Anomalie gefangen war, durch die Personen auf dem Schiff aus unerklärlichen Gründen die Plätze getauscht haben. Es wurde unverzüglich ein Rettungstrupp geschickt, um {mf|den Freihändler|die Freihändlerin} zu finden, das hat jedoch eine ganze Weile gedauert. Ende gut, alles gut: Der Lord Captain steht wieder am Ruder und setzt seine Reise durch die Koronus-Ausdehnung fort. Lang lebe {name} von Valancius!

languages.text: Le Maître-Vox loue l'Empereur de l'humanité alors que vous faites votre entrée sur la passerelle de commandement. Vigdis explique que vous avez été retenu par une anomalie qui a interverti les positions des individus à bord du vaisseau. Une équipe de secours a immédiatement été dépêchée pour chercher le Libre-Marchand, mais il a fallu du temps pour vous trouver. Tout est bien qui finit bien : le seigneur-capitaine est de retour aux commandes et poursuit son périple dans les Étendues de Koronus. Longue vie à {name} von Valancius !
languages.original_text: The Vox Master gives praise to the Emperor of Humanity as you make your entrance on the captain's bridge. Vigdis explains that you were trapped in an anomaly that made the people on the ship inexplicably trade places. A rescue squad was immediately dispatched to search for the Rogue Trader, but finding you took quite a bit of time. All's well that ends well: the Lord Captain is at the helm again, continuing {mf|his|her} journey through the Koronus Expanse. Long live {name} von Valancius!

traits.locale_text: Le maître du vox loue l'Empereur de l'humanité alors que {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande} fait son entrée sur la passerelle de commandement. Vigdis explique que {mf|le|la} seigneur-capitaine était {mf|piégé|piégée} dans une anomalie qui a interverti les positions des individus à bord du vaisseau. Une équipe de secours a immédiatement été dépêchée pour chercher {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande}, mais trouver Sa Seigneurie a pris un moment. Tout est bien qui finit bien : {mf|le|la} seigneur-capitaine est de retour aux commandes et poursuit son périple dans les Étendues de Koronus. Longue vie à {name} von Valancius !

languages.text: Sesini duyan Voks Üstadı, İnsanlığın İmparatoru'na övgüler yağdırıyor. Vigdis, gemideki insanların açıklanamaz bir şekilde yer değiştirmesine neden olan bir anomaliye yakalandığını açıklıyor. Bir kurtarma ekibi, Lord Kaptan'ı aramak için hemen görevlendirilmiş ancak seni bulmaları epey zaman alıyor. Neyse ki her şey yolunda: Lord Kaptan, yeniden dümenin başında ve Koronus Enginliği'ndeki yolculuğuna devam ediyor. {name} von Valancius çok yaşa!
languages.original_text: The Vox Master gives praise to the Emperor of Humanity as you make your entrance on the captain's bridge. Vigdis explains that you were trapped in an anomaly that made the people on the ship inexplicably trade places. A rescue squad was immediately dispatched to search for the Rogue Trader, but finding you took quite a bit of time. All's well that ends well: the Lord Captain is at the helm again, continuing {mf|his|her} journey through the Koronus Expanse. Long live {name} von Valancius!
